body_content.explanation: a thin hard layer of sugar used to cover something:
examples: Candy apples are whole apples covered in a hard sugar candy coating.
The almonds are roasted and covered with a pale blue candy coating.

body_content.explanation: a substance similar to chocolate that melts easily and can be produced in different colours and flavours, for covering cakes, sweets, etc.:
examples: Candy coating is much less expensive than real chocolate.
We sell many different coloured candy coatings, and mint flavoured candy coatings are also available.

body_content.explanation: an intentional attempt to make something seem less unpleasant or less serious than it really is:
examples: I'll tell you straight without any candy coating.
This can be a dangerous world and too much candy-coating helps no one.
